sentences.sContent: Harry inherited the house and a sizeable chunk of land.
sentences.sContent_eng: Harry inherited the house and a sizeable chunk of land.
sentences.sCn: 哈里继承了这座房子以及相当大的一片土地。

sentences.sContent: By and large the limbed tetrapods and near-tetrapods unearthed thus far have been sizeable beasts around a meter long.
sentences.sContent_eng: By and large the limbed tetrapods and near-tetrapods unearthed thus far have been sizeable beasts around a meter long.
sentences.sCn: 整体说来，目前发掘出的有肢四足动物或近四足动物，都是相当大的怪兽，体长约有一公尺。

words.tran: 相比（size的过去分词）；按大小分类
